about_the_game:
WELCOME GRACE

Age: 22 years old

Zodiac Sign: Taurus

Preferences: Big guns, extreme adventures, yachts, and helicopters.

A restless jokester, always full of new ideas. Grace finds it hard to stay in one place for long. She's carefree and hates deep discussions. Being with her is never dull — every encounter is sure to turn into a legendary adventure.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, Grace will become not only your dedicated companion but your adventurous muse! Grace will always keep you company on the main screen with her dynamic animations and exciting dialogs.

By purchasing this DLC, you get the Grace mascot! You can switch your mascot at any time by opening your profile and choosing the "Mascot" tab.

Along with the mascot, you're getting 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you're getting our undying gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Grace
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Grace, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
